ARABIC: أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَٰهُمْ كِتَٰبًا مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسْتَمْسِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or did We give them a Book before, which they are holding to?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did We give them a Scripture before this to which they are holding fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or did We bestow upon them a Book before on whose authority they are holding on (to angel-worship)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had We, before sending the Quran, given them a book to which they now refer as an authority?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or have We given them some Book before this, to which they hold fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have We given them any Book before this (the Qur'an) to which they are holding fast
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have We given them a book before it so that they hold fast to it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or did We bring them a Book aforetime to which they hold?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have We given them any scripture before (this Qur'an) so that they are holding fast thereto?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have We given them a Book before this, to which they are holding fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have We vouchsafed Unto them any Book before this, so that they are to it holding fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did We give them a Book before this, so that they are holding fast to it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What! have We given them a Book before this, to which they are holding fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have We given them any Book before this (the Quran), to which they are holding fast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or have We given them a Book before this which they hold fast to?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or have We given them a book prior to this one, to which they adhere?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:21] Or have We brought them a scripture before, that is, [before] the Qur’ān, that they should worship other than God, so that they are holding fast to it? In other words, this never happened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have We given them any Scripture before) this Qur'an (so that they are holding fast thereto) so that they take such a belief from this Scripture?
